text: And all the people of the land went into the house of Baal, and tore it down, and completely broke in pieces his altars and his images, and they slew Mathan the priest of Baal before the altars. And the priest 11. 18 Gr. placed. See John 15. 16.appointed overseers 11. 18 Gr. in or into.over the house of the Lord.
